titles.title: Abel and Mary Nicholson House National Historic Site Study Act of 2000

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the Abel and Mary Nicholson House located in Elsinboro Township, Salem County, New Jersey, as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 10/5/2000--Introduced. Abel and Mary Nicholson House National Historic Site Study Act of 2000 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to: (1) study and report to specified congressional committees on the suitability and feasibility of designating the Abel and Mary Nicholson House in Salem County, New Jersey, as a unit of the National Park System; and (2) consider management alternatives to create an administrative association with the New Jersey Coastal Heritage Trail Route.
